00033                 public gui_tsmi_preferences()
00034                 {
00035                         InitializeComponent();
00036                         this.SetStyle(ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer | ControlStyles.UserPaint | ControlStyles.AllPaintingInWmPaint, true);
00037                         this.UpdateStyles();
00038 
00039                         string ft = (Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Fadetime/1000).ToString();
00040                         comboBox1.SelectedItem = ft;
00041                         string mf = Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.MusicFolder;
00042                         kryptonLabel4.Text = Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.MusicFolder;
00043                         string pt = (Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.PictureShowTime/1000).ToString();
00044                         comboBox2.SelectedItem = pt;
00045 
00046                         kryptonGroup1.Dock = DockStyle.Fill;
00047                         kryptonGroup2.Dock = DockStyle.Fill;
00048 
00049                         listBox1.SelectedIndex = 0;
00050                         kryptonGroup1.Show();
00051 
00052                         this.ClientSize = new Size(480, 160);
00053                 }
00054 
00055                 private void listBox1_SelectedIndexChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
00056                 {
00057                         switch (listBox1.SelectedIndex)
00058                         {
00059                                 case 0:
00060                                         kryptonGroup1.Show();
00061                                         kryptonGroup2.Hide();
00062                                         break;
00063                                 case 1:
00064                                         kryptonGroup1.Hide();
00065                                         kryptonGroup2.Show();
00066                                         break;
00067                         }
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 private void comboBox1_SelectedIndexChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
00071                 {
00072                         int tmp;
00073                         switch (comboBox1.SelectedIndex)
00074                         {
00075                                 case 0:
00076                                         int.TryParse(comboBox1.SelectedItem.ToString(), out tmp);
00077                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Fadetime = tmp * 1000;
00078                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Save();
00079                                         Player.Instance.Fadetime = tmp;
00080                                         break;
00081                                 case 1:
00082                                         int.TryParse(comboBox1.SelectedItem.ToString(), out tmp);
00083                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Fadetime = tmp * 1000;
00084                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Save();
00085                                         Player.Instance.Fadetime = tmp;
00086                                         break;
00087                                 case 2:
00088                                         int.TryParse(comboBox1.SelectedItem.ToString(), out tmp);
00089                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Fadetime = tmp * 1000;
00090                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Save();
00091                                         Player.Instance.Fadetime = tmp;
00092                                         break;
00093                                 case 3:
00094                                         int.TryParse(comboBox1.SelectedItem.ToString(), out tmp);
00095                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Fadetime = tmp * 1000;
00096                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Save();
00097                                         Player.Instance.Fadetime = tmp;
00098                                         break;
00099                         }
00100                 }
00101 
00102                 private void kryptonButton1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00103                 {
00104                         folderBrowserDialog1.ShowDialog();
00105                         if (folderBrowserDialog1.SelectedPath != null)
00106                         {
00107                                 Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.MusicFolder = folderBrowserDialog1.SelectedPath;
00108                                 Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Save();
00109                                 kryptonLabel4.Text = folderBrowserDialog1.SelectedPath;
00110                         }
00111                 }
00112

00114                 {
00115                         int tmp;
00116                         switch (comboBox1.SelectedIndex)
00117                         {
00118                                 case 0:
00119                                         int.TryParse(comboBox2.SelectedItem.ToString(), out tmp);
00120                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.PictureShowTime = tmp * 1000;
00121                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Save();
00122                                         Player.Instance.Picshowtime = tmp;
00123                                         break;
00124                                 case 1:
00125                                         int.TryParse(comboBox2.SelectedItem.ToString(), out tmp);
00126                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.PictureShowTime = tmp * 1000;
00127                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Save();
00128                                         Player.Instance.Picshowtime = tmp;
00129                                         break;
00130                                 case 2:
00131                                         int.TryParse(comboBox2.SelectedItem.ToString(), out tmp);
00132                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.PictureShowTime = tmp * 1000;
00133                                         Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Save();
00134                                         Player.Instance.Picshowtime = tmp;
00135                                         break;
00136                                 case 3:
